com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model

Interface ResourceTemplate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configured
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputeInstanceTemplate, DatabaseServerInstanceTemplate, InstanceTemplate, SimpleResourceTemplate

    public interface ResourceTemplate
extends Configured
    Represents a template for constructing cloud resources.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the template.
      Map<String,String> getTags()
      Returns the map of tags to be applied to resources created from the template.
      Object unwrap()
      Return the underlying cloud provider specific implementation or null

      Intended for internal provider use only.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.Configured

        getConfiguration, getConfigurationValue, getConfigurationValue

    • Method Detail

        Returns the name of the template.

      • getTags

        Map<String,String> getTags()
        Returns the map of tags to be applied to resources created from the template.
        Returns:
        the map of tags to be applied to resources created from the template

      • unwrap

        Object unwrap()
        Return the underlying cloud provider specific implementation or null

        Intended for internal provider use only. The consumer of the API will not try to use this in any way.
